blogPost.title: RT @Breaking911: BREAKING: New York City establishments with a Liquor License, only allowed to operate outdoors, are now also banned from a…
blogPost.author: The_Real_Fly

sharedContent.title: BREAKING: New York City establishments with a Liquor License, only allowed to operate outdoors, are now also banned from allowing customers to use the restroom or pick-up food indoors. Other restrictions also added.
sharedContent.author: Breaking911

localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 突破：纽约市拥有酒类许可证的机构，只允许在户外经营，现在也被禁止允许顾客在室内使用洗手间或取食物。还增加了其他限制。
突破：紐約市擁有酒類許可證的機構，只允許在戶外經營，現在也被禁止允許顧客在室內使用洗手間或取食物。還增加了其他限制。

previous.excerpt:
Motley Fool Stock Advisor gives pre-pumped stock alerts. First buy alert I
received on Dec 3. The email came at 1:45pm EST, and when I went to check the
chart, that stock had been pumping since 1pm which is 45 min before the buy
signal.

Today's pick which is the second pick of the month, also came…
previous.title: Beware: Motley Fool Stock Advisor seems to be a pump scheme

localize.title: 小心：混杂的傻瓜股票顾问似乎是一个抽水计划
localize.the_new_excerpt:
Motley Fool Stock Advisor提供预抽送的股票警报。首次购买警示I
12月3日收到。这封邮件是在美国东部时间下午1点45分收到的，当我去查看
图表显示，那只股票从下午1点，也就是买入前45分钟开始暴涨。
信号。

今天的选秀是这个月的第二个选秀，也是来自…。

localize.title: 小心：混雜的傻瓜股票顧問似乎是一個抽水計劃
localize.the_new_excerpt:
Motley Fool Stock Advisor提供預抽送的股票警報。首次購買警示I
12月3日收到。這封郵件是在美國東部時間下午1點45分收到的，當我去查看
圖表顯示，那隻股票從下午1點，也就是買入前45分鐘開始暴漲。
信號。

今天的選秀是這個月的第二個選秀，也是來自…。
